snippet: The hedge fund had pushed for a breakup of EMC, but after the deal to expand the board to 13 members, Elliott will vote in favor of EMC’s entire slate of director nominees.
abstract: The hedge fund had pushed for a breakup of EMC, but after the deal to expand the board to 13 members, Elliott will vote in favor of EMC’s entire slate of director nominees.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: EMC to Add 2 Directors in Temporary Truce With Elliott Management
